_meta.source: Researched from Skagway tourism, White Pass Railroad, and NPS

bbox_hint.note: Covers Skagway town, railroad, and Chilkoot Trail access

transit_routes.name: Walk to Broadway
transit_routes.note: All docks within easy walk of historic Broadway Street.

transit_routes.name: White Pass Railroad
transit_routes.note: Multiple trip options: Summit Excursion, Fraser, or Yukon Adventure. Book well ahead.

featured_experiences.name: White Pass & Yukon Route Railroad
featured_experiences.note: THE signature Skagway experience. Multiple routes. Book far in advance - sells out.

featured_experiences.name: Gold Rush Historic District
featured_experiences.note: Broadway preserved as 1898 boomtown. Free NPS walking tour. Excellent museums.

featured_experiences.name: Chilkoot Trail Experience
featured_experiences.note: Day trips to lower trail and Dyea available. Full trail is serious multi-day hike.
